woshintan post wisin wartha karana lada dhawala mandira sampindanaya kirimakata anuwa anekuth fedaral samaja wiyadam, dolar agayen gath kala ihatha agayanta wada aduwen wuwath prathishatha washayen gath kala eetath wada kappaduwakata lakwanu atha: wasara dahayak pura aahara muddara, niwasa sandaha sahaya saha anekuth sahanadhara wadapiliwelawal walin ado biliyana 327k; fedaral saha thapal sewakayan sandaha athi wishrama watup wada piliwelawal walin ado biliyana 200k; aahara saha niwasa sambandhayenda sahaya wana shishyayanta naya dena wadapiliwelawal walin ado biliyana 207k; parasarika aarakshaka eejansiyen siyayata 32k, prawahana departhamenthuwen siyayata 22k, abhyanthara katayuthu departhamenthuwen siyayata 11k, adhyapana departhamenthuwen siyayata 12k saha saukhya saha manawa sewawan departhamenthuwen siyayata 12k washayen wana kappadu mita ayath we.

ohu hadda pitisara gamiyaku wu nisaya.emathu da nowa ape gami awathum pawathum piligath, daruwan wenuwen mahath duk kandulak isulu ee gami amma pilibanda puwatha obata kimataya.ikuth da ali sangananayata gos ali karadarayakata path wanajiwi ha gowijana sewa amathi esa. em. chandrasena nohoth samarakon mudiyanselage chandrasena dan ma abimuwa hindi.
